Essex UK and global transport connectivity for high-technology businesses…

A range of location advantages are attracting high-tech businesses to Essex UK, including the county’s technology cluster, specialist workforce and cost advantages. But Essex’s optimal geographical location and transport connectivity are consistently amongst the key benefits cited by companies expanding in the county.

Fast access to London, Cambridge and major UK airports…
 

Essex’s Harlow Enterprise Zone (CM17 postcode) exemplifies the county’s location advantages for high-technology businesses. Strategically located at junction 7 of the M11 motorway, the site provides occupants with access to the global ‘tech hub’ cities of London and Cambridge, as well as London Heathrow Airport, in less than 1 hour. London Stansted airport can be accessed by road in just 14 minutes. [1]

Fast access to UK technology locations…

Essex’s proximity to London and the M25 provides businesses with fast access to southern England’s key high-technology locations, as well as continental European markets via the Channel Tunnel [1]: 

From Harlow (CM17) to:Drive TimeDistance
Cambridge (Cambridgeshire)43 mins37 miles
London57 mins28 miles
Dover (Eurotunnel)1.35 hrs89 miles
Oxford (Oxfordshire)1.42 hrs85 miles
Reading (Berkshire)1.36 hrs76 miles
Basingstoke (Hampshire)1.40 hrs84 miles
Crawley (W Sussex)1.14 hrs62 miles

Global air connectivity via London Stansted and Heathrow airports…

For international business travellers, Essex provides fast, comprehensive global air connectivity - from London Stansted, London Heathrow and four other London airports, all accessible within 1 hour: 

London Stansted
Essex
- 150 destinations
- European connectivity
- UK’s 4th busiest airport
- From Harlow (by road): 14 mins / 13 miles

 

London Heathrow
UK Hub Airport
- 185 destinations; 84 countries
- Global connectivity
- Europe’s busiest airport
- From Harlow (by road): 54 mins / 51 miles

 

Other London Airports
(from Harlow, by road):
London Southend: 52 mins / 35 miles
London City: 32 mins / 22 miles
London Luton: 49 mins / 42 miles      
London Gatwick: 1 hr / 58 miles

Unrivalled multimodal freight transport connectivity…

For industrial businesses, Essex’s ‘UK Multimodal Gateway’ provides freight transport infrastructure that is unrivalled within the UK:

Essex’s multimodal freight transport hub incorporates:

  • 4 Sea Ports: Handling containers and all other all cargo types
  • 6 Rail Freight Terminals: Providing fast connections to UK and European markets
  • 6 London Airports: Accessible within 1 hour
  • Direct Motorway Links: Providing fast access to UK and European markets

Find out more

Contact INVEST Essex to find out more about Essex as the optimal location for your high-technology business.

Biography

Simon has worked in inward investment for the last four years, building a wide network of trusted business connections, working on a variety of successful projects in the advanced manufacturing sector. Prior to this, Simon spent 7 years advising business owners and entrepreneurs, with a focus on bringing innovative products to market.
